description: A config object that describes the list of MCP servers Neuro is allowed access to.

servers.description: An array of MCP servers to give Neuro access to.

name.description: The display name of the server that will be used. If not specified, falls back to the MCP URL.

url.description: The URL to the MCP server.

type.description: The type of server. Currently only supports `http`.

credentials.description: An array of credential variables the connection may need. Currently unused.

startup.description: Whether or not to connect to this server on extension startup.

allowedTools.description: An array of tools that Neuro is allowed to use. Defaults to allowing all registered tools from this server.

inherit.description: Whether or not to inherit from VS Code's MCP configuration.
